Type.Name: IEnvoyInfo

TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEnvoyInfo

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

remarks.para: Use this interface to provide custom envoy information that is carried along with the objects.

Classes that implement the current interface hold a serialized chain of message sinks that is regenerated when a proxy is created to represent the object. Such functionality is used for bound object types only, and represents the groups of objects that provide run-time services such as transactions.

Docs.value: To be added: an object of type 'Messaging.IMessageSink'

summary.para: Gets or sets the list of envoys that were contributed by the server context and object chains when the object was marshaled.
